about_the_game:
Collide with the bouncing video logos!
Experience the new sensation battle game 'ScreenSaver Battle,' where video logos on your screen saver clash and trigger special moves upon hitting the corners!!
The satisfying moment when a logo hits the corner in a screen saver now becomes even more thrilling in this battle game! Aim for the corners and enjoy the collisions every day!

Game Description

Have you ever seen a video logo that just bounces around?
There’s even a meme where people cheer when the logo hits the corner. This game is a parody screen saver battle game that lets you enjoy the thrill of those corner hits to the fullest.

You control a VIDEO logo. If you hit a logo labeled BOSS, you will take damage.

When the VIDEO logo hits the corner, a special move is activated, allowing you to defeat the BOSS logo in one shot!

The game is easy to play: simply point the arrow in the direction you want to launch the logo and click to release. Then, just watch the results unfold like a spinning top or simulation game. It’s great to enjoy with a bag of popcorn, just like watching a movie.

Simple yet incredibly satisfying!

About This Game

This game was created by the game development YouTuber "SHINISE" as part of his "24-Hour Game Creation Challenge."
The idea was to create a game that streamers can play casually while chatting, and this is the result of that experiment.

Play Time

15 to 60 minutes


Video Streaming Guidelines
Streaming is allowed without permission for both individuals and corporations, but please review and adhere to the following guidelines:

It would be helpful if you include the name of the game in the title of your video or stream.
It's optional, but we would appreciate it if you include a link to the Steam page in the description.
Monetization is allowed only through features provided by the video streaming sites.
Paid streams, such as YouTube member-only streams, are also permitted.
We are not responsible for any damages resulting from streaming videos of this game.
The content of these guidelines may change without notice.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 460 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
